Wed, 22 May 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Celebrating winning the 2024 Tairāwhiti women's pennants golf series are Māhia members Trena Smith (left), Maraea Wesche, Renee Hiko, Jackie Thompson, Viv Kyle and Lee Steel. Kyle won the overall net at the Gisborne Park women's open, of which the sixth and final pennants round was a part.
